title: Watch Face Neon City Wallpaper
summary: The cool scene of a neon city flies by as you tell the time.
description: Customize your watch face with mezmerizing neon city that animates in the background. This animated wallpaper features HD graphics, smooth animations and variable neon city options for a look that's sure to leave you pleased. This custom watchface operates in the background so users can keep the full-functionality of their smartwatch including date, time and push notifications.Stand out from the crowd with a custom watch design. Download Neon City Watch Face today!Works for most round & square smartwatches including: Android WearMoto 360 ( moto360 )Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )Huawei WatchLG G Watch R ( lgwr )LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )Samsung Gear LiveAsus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )Fossil QTAG Heuer ConnectedMichael Kors AccessNixon The MissionPolar M600Tickwatchand more!When using Android Wear 2.0 on your smartwatch, you will find the watch face by entering the Google Play Store on your watch and navigating down until you see a list of apps installed on your phone.Osthoro is delivering some of the best smartwatch wallpapers available today. descriptionHTML:
Customize your watch face with mezmerizing neon city that animates in the background. This animated wallpaper features HD graphics, smooth animations and variable neon city options for a look that's sure to leave you pleased. This custom watchface operates in the background so users can keep the full-functionality of their smartwatch including date, time and push notifications.
Stand out from the crowd with a custom watch design. Download Neon City Watch Face today!

Works for most round & square smartwatches including:
Android Wear
Moto 360 ( moto360 )
Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )
Huawei Watch
LG G Watch R ( lgwr )
LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )
LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )
Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )
Samsung Gear Live
Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )
Fossil Q
TAG Heuer Connected
Michael Kors Access
Nixon The Mission
Polar M600
Tickwatch
and more!

When using Android Wear 2.0 on your smartwatch, you will find the watch face by entering the Google Play Store on your watch and navigating down until you see a list of apps installed on your phone.

Osthoro is delivering some of the best smartwatch wallpapers available today. Find other unique live wallpapers for your smartwatch by visiting www.osthoro.com today.
comments: Okay, but looses the settings for colour chosen for text and other options whenever the watch is turned off. Please fix, then 5 stars.
App on phone caused over 100 tabs to open in Chrome spamming it's website. Nearly crashed my phone and took considerable effort to uninstall. Beware.
My watch face is a dark grey when I use it. It just shows the time on top.  This does not work for lg urbane 2nd edition. Looks cool but wished it worked on my watch.
IndeedThe digital animations are indeed very deep, and I love it.
Didn't work just got me to look at ads
